name: The Day A God Fell In Love
name_original: The Day A God Fell In Love
description:
Summary: Ginki heard a few rumors about the things going on in the library and decided to take a look to get to the bottom of it. 

Warning: Some swears, some sensitive content if you squint. Mostly story driven with little battling . 

Made in a Month, probably less than that due to time constraints limiting my work time to the weekends. Only one person worked on putting the entire game together, other resources were either found or friends lent a  hand with art. 

This is a project I made to help me practice for a more long term project which is also connected. Please report any bugs found in the games. 

Thanks for playing!
